transcript:
kya chahta hai ye fir kya kehta hai refund mang raha hai?
[inaudible] close karna padega na reply kar do reply aa jayega aapka reply mang raha hai.

Hello, chuka diya usko.
Hello.
Hello.
Yes, is this Iris?
Can you call me tomorrow? Today is my off day. I'm in. Oh, okay. Okay, ma'am. Okay.
summary:
